subject: Football
lead_paragraph: With the Vikings’ win over the Packers, Brett Favre became the first player in N.F.L. history to beat all 32 teams in his career. The Vikings remain perfect at 4-0.
snippet: With the Vikings’ win over the Packers, Brett Favre became the first player in N.F.L. history to beat all 32 teams in his career. The Vikings remain perfect at 4-0.
